short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download images from unsplash.com with the width and height you specify. No more massive files that need to be resized!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tiny extension makes it easy to download images from the brilliant unsplash.com at a resolution that you specify. This means smaller downloads, and less hassle resizing images.

To use:
  - Install the extension
  - Click on a photo on unsplash.com
  - The extension action button should light up (you may need to click the 3 dots to the right of the omnibox to find it)
  - Click the button, enter the width and height of your download (in pixels), then click download

Note that if you specify widths and heights with a different aspect ratio to that of the original image, some portions of it will be cropped.
